name: 陳文輝
objective: 本課程以人工智慧及機器學習為主題，實例討論方式進行，旨在培養學生具備從事學術工作所需之研究能力。課程內容主要包括：研究問題定義與假設、資料收集、文獻評論、理論方法、研究倫理、案例探討，研究報告撰寫等。
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
week 2  AI literature review
week 3  ML literature review 
week 4  Instructions for reading a scientific paper effectively
week 5-6 References  
week 7-8 Writing format styles
week 9-10 Midterm presentation
week 11-12 Research frameworks
week 13-14 Instructions for writing a scientific paper effectively
week 15-16 Academic phrases for writing results & discussion Sections
week 17-18 Final presentation
scorePolicy:
出席 & amp; 討論 50%
